text: Edappadi Rajagopal Krishnan (21 April 1922 – 13 May 1998) was an Indian politician from the All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam. == Family == Krishnan was to E. Rajagopal. He served as a member of the Tamil Nadu Legislative Assembly from 1967 to 1971, Lok Sabha from 1971 to 1977 and the Rajya Sabha from 18 July 1977 to 2 April 1980. == References == * Category:1922 births Category:1998 deaths Category:5th Lok Sabha members Category:Lok Sabha members from Tamil Nadu Category:People from Salem district Category:Rajya Sabha members from Tamil Nadu
title: E. R. Krishnan
